text: Pedro Cea (1 September 1900 – 18 September 1970) is a former Uruguayan football player. He played for Uruguay national team. ==Career statistics== ===International=== :Source: Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Uruguay 1923 3 1 Uruguay 1924 10 6 Uruguay 1925 0 0 Uruguay 1926 0 0 Uruguay 1927 1 0 Uruguay 1928 5 1 Uruguay 1929 2 0 Uruguay 1930 4 5 Uruguay 1931 0 0 Uruguay 1932 1 0 Total Total 26 13 ===International goals=== Uruguay's goal tally first #
